item.title: Any of these 8 tech stocks could become a $5 trillion company before Nvidia does
item.description: There’s a good chance Nvidia won’t become the U.S. stock market’s first $5 trillion company.

item.title: These five unseen drivers could propel the bull market even higher, according to this Wall Street veteran
item.description: The stock market could soar even higher if these pillars of strength are unleashed, says Jim Paulsen of Paulsen Perspectives.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
